extendedInfo.description: I wrote this application because I started doing Weight Watchers with my wife.Free base app features:* Food tracker* Weight tracker* Supports new & old systems* Food calculators* Activity calculators* Daily allowance calculators* Favorites* WidgetsSubscription features:* Multi-device and forum sync* Weight-loss progress chart in your forum profile* Edit, add, and delete weight-log entries from the forum, have changes sync to your phone* Simple device changing, no more swapping sdcards, simply sync the data down to your new device!* Barcode searching for nutrition information!* More to come!This program is highly configurable and can be made to work with almost any point program!  Try it out and post feedback on the forum to help make it better for everyone!IMPORTANT!All support provided through the forum, please post problems there.  I cannot respond to comments in the market.By using this program you agree that I am not responsible for any of your problems :)I am not affiliated with Weight Watchers

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Does everything I want it to. The only downside as someone else mentioned is the UK propoints seem different from the US ones but isn\'t really a problem.
reviews.author: Nadia Botham

reviews.title: Practically perfect
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, absolutely love it. Perfectly usable without the subscription which adds synchronisation features to allow data to be synced automatically between devices, but as a multiple device user this is a brilliant feature. If the Ireland and UK formula were built in this would be perfect, but this can be added under Custom Formula: Round(((16 * protein) + (19 * carbs) + (45 * fat) + (5 * fiber)) /175)
reviews.author: Michael Noone

reviews.title: FANTASTIC APP
reviews.comment: This is by far the best WW app that\'s free. I use the old ww program momentum and i love how this has the old style points calculator (or you can use the new).  Just what i needed.   Looovvee it!   I highly reccommend!!
reviews.author: Crystal McLuckie

reviews.title: Great APP!!
reviews.comment: Excellent alternative to paying money every month to a database that doesn\'t automatically list the foods I eat anyway. Clean and easy to use...not too busy. Basic is so much better. Thanks for creating this great app!
reviews.author: Gayla Uslu

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I have used the official Weight Watchers app in the past, . . . but I like this one so much more!
reviews.author: Jennifer Orkin

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app very easy to use and lost a lot of weight using it
reviews.author: Klanique Thornton

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Just started using this yesterday..so far I love it..tracks everything I need..my only Queston is..what is the barcode scanner for? It doesn\'t calculate points if you scan a product..just takes you to the Web to places you can purchase the item..other then that love this app.
reviews.author: Rose Berube

reviews.title: Pretty good.  Water tracking could be easier
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this today.  So far my only issue is...I would like to be able to track water without creating an entry.  If you could just click on the bottles on the diary page, that would be great.
reviews.author: Lisa Downey

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a variety of WW apps and this one is the best by far. Easy to use.  I wasn\'t able to find it to download a few weeks ago when I upgraded phones, was completely bummed. Glad I found it again today. Phew!  No other app compares in my opinion. Thank you!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this app - thank you, thank you!   Easy to use and fully customizable!   I love that I can use the old system on here too!   I tried a few other diary apps (even some that I had to pay for) and none of them compare to this app!
reviews.author: Stephanie Richards

reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised!
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app today after researching some other apps in Google Play & I have to say that I am pleasantly surprised! It has everything that I need in a WW app (points calculator, daily AND weekly points tracker, activity tracker, weight loss tracker) & the best part about it is that it\'s free! I love that it\'s fully customizable (even the font!) & it doesn\'t seem to slow my phone down at all.    If you\'re looking for a Points Plus app to help you stick to the WW program, look no further!     THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU for this app!
reviews.author: Courtney Burkett

reviews.title: Best tracking app out there
reviews.comment: This is a great app.  It really does provide everything you need to be successful in achieving your goals. The app support is awesome too.  In short it\'s everything the official WW app should, but fails miserably to be!
reviews.author: Catherine Dunn

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I love this app.  It\'s very straightforward and does everything I need it to do.  It\'s only shortcoming in my opinion is that the widget calculates my weight loss from the very first weigh-in I entered rather than the one I have set as my beginning point, which is more recent. Since I\'ve been using this for over two years and have gone up and down quite a bit that is a major shortcoming.  The widget could be very motivational if this could be fixed!  In the meantime,  I\'m deducting a star.
reviews.author: Marcy Edwards

reviews.title: PERFECT!!
reviews.comment: For a free app, this one can\'t get any better. It has everything, literally EVERYTHING, I was looking for. Went thru a lot of apps till I finally found this one. Thanks so much!! Wish I could give it more than 5 stars...
reviews.author: Kristen Daniels

reviews.title: Never had any problems! Love it!
reviews.author: Courtney McCray

reviews.title: Best out there
reviews.comment: I have tried several weight watchers apps n this is by far my favorite
reviews.author: Ang L

reviews.title: So useful.
reviews.comment: I\'ve only been using this app for like 2 day. And it is soooo helpful. I use this along with myfitnesspal. I think using both really works well for me so far
reviews.author: Ciera Miller

reviews.comment: So much better than wasting paper for keeping track of points and weight loss. So happy!! I needed this! It has everything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: With the help of this app I  lost 25 lbs in three months! Thank you!!
reviews.author: lindsey young
